stage1.definition: To handle matters, to work, to serve
stage1.example: 我们是给群众办事的。(wǒ men shì gěi qún zhòng bàn shì de) - We are here to serve the people.
请把这个包裹转交给李老师。(qǐng bǎ zhè gè bāo guǒ zhuǎn jiāo gěi lǐ lǎo shī) - Please deliver this package to Teacher Li.

stage1.definition: To contain, to include, to embody
stage1.example: 这句话包含好几层意思。(zhè jù huà bāo hán hǎo jǐ céng yì si) - This sentence contains several layers of meaning.

stage1.definition: To include, to comprise, to contain
stage1.example: 我说大家，自然包括你在内。(wǒ shuō dà jiā, zì rán bāo kuò nǐ zài nèi) - When I say 'everyone', naturally that includes you.
我觉得这个床垫有点儿薄。(wǒ jué de zhè ge chuáng diàn yǒu diǎn er báo) - I think this mattress is a bit thin.

stage2.example: 这幅画是我们家的传家宝。(zhè fú huà shì wǒ men jiā de chuán jiā bǎo) - This painting is a family heirloom of our household.
我要一张你宝宝的照片，好吗？(wǒ yào yī zhāng nǐ bǎo bao de zhào piàn, hǎo ma) - May I have a picture of your baby?
那不是这个小宝贝的错处。(nà bú shì zhè ge xiǎo bǎo bèi de cuò chù) - That's not this little darling's fault.
这是极可宝贵的经验。(zhè shì jí kě bǎo guì de jīng yàn) - This is an extremely valuable experience.
我的眼睛盯着他的宝石戒指。(wǒ de yǎn jīng dīng zhe tā de bǎo shí jiè zhi) - My eyes were fixed on his gemstone ring.

stage3.definition: To keep secret, to maintain confidentiality
stage3.example: 保密做得好，工作会更好。(bǎo mì zuò de hǎo, gōng zuò huì gèng hǎo) - If confidentiality is maintained well, work will go better.
我们应该学会保守秘密。(wǒ men yīng gāi xué huì bǎo shǒu mì mì) - We should learn to keep secrets.

stage3.definition: To hold, to carry in arms, to hug
stage3.example: 母亲抱着孩子去买菜。(mǔ qīn bào zhe hái zi qù mǎi cài) - The mother carried her child in her arms to buy groceries.
这幅画的背景是一片森林。(zhè fú huà de bèi jǐng shì yī piàn sēn lín) - The background of this painting is a forest.
二的五倍是十。(èr de wǔ bèi shì shí) - Five times two is ten.

stage4.definition: To be forced, to be compelled
stage4.example: 敌人被迫放下武器。(dí rén bèi pò fàng xià wǔ qì) - The enemy was forced to put down their weapons.
只有少数本科生会继续从事学术工作。(zhǐ yǒu shǎo shù běn kē shēng huì jì xù cóng shì xué shù gōng zuò) - Only a few undergraduates will continue to engage in academic work.
你这个人真笨。(nǐ zhè ge rén zhēn bèn) - You are really stupid.
上半场的比分为三比一。(shàng bàn chǎng de bǐ fèn wéi sān bǐ yī) - The score of the first half was 3:1.
毕业后你们想做什么工作？(bì yè hòu nǐ men xiǎng zuò shén me gōng zuò) - What kind of work do you want to do after graduation?

stage5.example: 这家公司招聘了一批大学毕业生。(zhè jiā gōng sī zhāo pìn le yī pī dà xué bì yè shēng) - This company recruited a group of university graduates.

stage5.definition: To avoid, to evade, to escape
stage5.example: 没带雨伞那就避一下雨。(méi dài yǔ sǎn nà jiù bì yī xià yǔ) - If you didn't bring an umbrella, then avoid the rain for a bit.

stage5.definition: To avoid, to prevent, to avert
stage5.example: 这件事情是难以避免的。(zhè jiàn shì qíng shì nán yǐ bì miǎn de) - This matter is difficult to avoid.

stage5.definition: To compile, to edit, to weave, to compose
stage5.example: 编词典是一种吃力的古工。(biān cí diǎn shì yī zhǒng chī lì de gǔ gōng) - Compiling a dictionary is a laborious old work.

stage5.definition: To debate, to argue, discussion, argument
stage5.example: 小明没有心思继续辩论下去了。(xiǎo míng méi yǒu xīn sī jì xù biàn lùn xià qù le) - Xiao Ming had no desire to continue the debate.

stage6.example: 难道你没有看见限速的标志吗？(nán dào nǐ méi yǒu kàn jiàn xiàn sù de biāo zhì ma) - Haven't you seen the speed limit sign?
他的表情一点儿也没有变化。(tā de biǎo qíng yī diǎn er yě méi yǒu biàn huà) - His expression hasn't changed at all.

stage6.definition: To praise, to commend, to compliment
stage6.example: 他在厂里多次受到表扬。(tā zài chǎng lǐ duō cì shòu dào biǎo yáng) - He has been praised many times at the factory.
我告诉过你，别动我的东西。(wǒ gào sù guò nǐ, bié dòng wǒ de dōng xi) - I've told you, don't touch my things.
天气极冷时水能结成冰。(tiān qì jí lěng shí shuǐ néng jié chéng bīng) - Water can freeze into ice when the weather is extremely cold.

stage7.example: 我家冰箱里面什么东西都有。(wǒ jiā bīng xiāng lǐ miàn shén me dōng xi dōu yǒu) - In my refrigerator there is everything.
冰雪湿滑，人们很难站稳。(bīng xuě shī huá, rén men hěn nán zhàn wěn) - The ice and snow are slippery, making it hard for people to stand firmly.
我们当兵就是为了保护人民的利益。(wǒ men dāng bīng jiù shì wèi le bǎo hù rén mín de lì yì) - We serve as soldiers in order to protect the interests of the people.

stage7.definition: To combine, to merge, and, also, together
stage7.example: 两大组织并组成一个新党。(liǎng dà zǔ zhī bìng zǔ chéng yī gè xīn dǎng) - The two major organizations merged to form a new party.
这病不要紧，吃点儿药就好。(zhè bìng bú yào jǐn, chī diǎn er yào jiù hǎo) - This illness is not serious, take some medicine and it will be fine.

stage8.definition: Not to care, not to mind, indifferent to
stage8.example: 他自己有主张，不在乎别人怎么说。(tā zì jǐ yǒu zhǔ zhāng, bú zài hu bié rén zěn me shuō) - He has his own ideas and doesn't care what others say.
不管困难多大，我们还要克服。(bù guǎn kùn nán duō dà, wǒ men hái yào kè fú) - No matter how great the difficulties, we still need to overcome them.
快走吧，不然，就要迟到了。(kuài zǒu ba, bú rán, jiù yào chí dào le) - Go quickly, otherwise, you'll be late.

stage8.definition: To arrange, to set up, to decorate, layout
stage8.example: 我的房间布置得很漂亮。(wǒ de fáng jiān bù zhì de hěn piào liang) - My room is arranged very beautifully.

stage8.definition: To walk, to go on foot
stage8.example: 与其坐车，不如步行。(yǔ qí zuò chē, bù rú bù xíng) - Rather than taking a car, it's better to walk.

stage9.definition: To wipe, to rub, to polish, to erase
stage9.example: 他用袖子擦干脸上的汗水。(tā yòng xiù zi cā gàn liǎn shàng de hàn shuǐ) - He used his sleeve to wipe the sweat on his face.

stage9.definition: Ability, talent, gift, only then, only, just now
stage9.example: 他是一个多才多艺的人。(tā shì yī gè duō cái duō yì de rén) - He is a person with many talents.
他打算写一部小说，正在搜集材料。(tā dǎ suàn xiě yī bù xiǎo shuō, zhèng zài sōu jí cái liào) - He plans to write a novel and is currently gathering materials.
我爸爸死后他继承了财产。(wǒ bà ba sǐ hòu tā jì chéng le cái chǎn) - After my father died, he inherited the property.
财富不一定会带来幸福。(cái fù bù yī dìng huì dài lái xìng fú) - Wealth doesn't necessarily bring happiness.

stage10.definition: To interview, to gather news, to collect information
stage10.example: 你知道我为什么想采访你吗？(nǐ zhī dào wǒ wèi shén me xiǎng cǎi fǎng nǐ ma) - Do you know why I want to interview you?

stage10.definition: To consult, to refer to, reference
stage10.example: 作者写这本书，参考了几十种书刊。(zuò zhě xiě zhè běn shū, cān kǎo le jǐ shí zhǒng shū kān) - In writing this book, the author consulted dozens of books and periodicals.

stage10.definition: To participate in, to take part in
stage10.example: 他参与了一场激烈的争论。(tā cān yù le yī chǎng jī liè de zhēng lùn) - He participated in a heated debate.
老师叫孩子们到操场上去做活动。(lǎo shī jiào hái zi men dào cāo chǎng shàng qù zuò huó dòng) - The teacher asked the children to go to the playground to do activities.

stage10.definition: To operate, to work, to manipulate
stage10.example: 你知道如何操作电脑吗？(nǐ zhī dào rú hé cāo zuò diàn nǎo ma) - Do you know how to operate a computer?

stage11.definition: To survey, to measure, to test
stage11.example: 老师今天要测我们的英语。(lǎo shī jīn tiān yào cè wǒ men de yīng yǔ) - The teacher is going to test our English today.

stage11.definition: To survey, to measure, to gauge
stage11.example: 我们在小的气象站测量气温。(wǒ men zài xiǎo de qì xiàng zhàn cè liáng qì wēn) - We measure the temperature at a small weather station.
实习生顺利地通过了测试。(shí xí shēng shùn lì de tōng guò le cè shì) - The intern passed the test smoothly.
他曾和我一起工作过。(tā céng hé wǒ yī qǐ gōng zuò guò) - He once worked with me.
这种牌子的茶叶很好。(zhè zhǒng pái zi de chá yè hěn hǎo) - This brand of tea is very good.

stage12.example: 产品出厂都要经过检查。(chǎn pǐn chū chǎng dōu yào jīng guò jiǎn chá) - Products must be inspected before leaving the factory.
我不能忍受这样的长途旅行。(wǒ bù néng rěn shòu zhè yàng de cháng tú lǚ xíng) - I cannot bear such a long-distance journey.
你难道一点儿常识也没有吗？(nǐ nán dào yī diǎn er cháng shí yě méi yǒu ma) - Don't you have even a bit of common sense?
你向我借过一些唱片吗？(nǐ xiàng wǒ jiè guò yī xiē chàng piàn ma) - Have you ever borrowed any records from me?

stage12.definition: To copy, to plagiarize, to search and seize
stage12.example: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。(bǎ zhè yī yè chāo dào nǐ de bǐ jì běn shàng) - Copy this page into your notebook.

stage13.example: 请抄写第二页的课文抄写一遍。(qǐng chāo xiě dì èr yè de kè wén chāo xiě yī biàn) - Please copy the text from the second page once.
一连下了好几天雨，东西容易发潮。(yī lián xià le hǎo jǐ tiān yǔ, dōng xi róng yì fā cháo) - After several consecutive days of rain, things easily get damp.
他想改变社会主义的潮流。(tā xiǎng gǎi biàn shè huì zhǔ yì de cháo liú) - He wants to change the trend of socialism.
南方潮湿，北方则比较干燥。(nán fāng cháo shī, běi fāng zé bǐ jiào gàn zào) - The south is humid, while the north is relatively dry.
我们要彻底改变旧风气。(wǒ men yào chè dǐ gǎi biàn jiù fēng qì) - We need to thoroughly change the old atmosphere.

stage14.definition: To sink, to submerge, deep, profound
stage14.example: 如果船超载了，它则会沉。(rú guǒ chuán chāo zài le, tā zé huì chén) - If the boat is overloaded, it will sink.
他沉默了一会儿又继续说下去。(tā chén mò le yī huì er yòu jì xù shuō xià qù) - He was silent for a while and then continued speaking.
他这两天的心情特别沉重。(tā zhè liǎng tiān de xīn qíng tè bié chén zhòng) - His mood has been especially heavy these two days.

stage14.definition: To praise, to commend, to compliment
stage14.example: 我们不得不称赞他的勇敢。(wǒ men bù dé bù chēng zàn tā de yǒng gǎn) - We cannot help but praise his courage.
我们认为你应行成人礼。(wǒ men rèn wéi nǐ yīng xíng chéng rén lǐ) - We think you should perform the coming-of-age ceremony.

stage15.example: 她大方，诚实，而又勇敢。(tā dà fāng, chéng shí, ér yòu yǒng gǎn) - She is generous, honest, and also brave.
诚信是做人之根本，立业之基。(chéng xìn shì zuò rén zhī gēn běn, lì yè zhī jī) - Honesty is the foundation of being a person and the basis for establishing a career.

stage15.definition: To undertake, to assume, to bear, to take responsibility
stage15.example: 他承担了做部长的所有责任。(tā chéng dān le zuò bù zhǎng de suǒ yǒu zé rèn) - He took on all the responsibilities of being a minister.

stage15.definition: To admit, to acknowledge, to recognize
stage15.example: 法律不承认未登记的婚姻。(fǎ lǜ bù chéng rèn wèi dēng jì de hūn yīn) - The law does not recognize unregistered marriages.

stage15.definition: To punish, to penalize, punishment, penalty
stage15.example: 不能对他太惩罚，以免伤害他的自尊心。(bù néng duì tā tài chéng fá, yǐ miǎn shāng hài tā de zì zūn xīn) - We shouldn't punish him too much, to avoid hurting his self-esteem.

stage16.example: 北京是一个历史悠久的城市。(běi jīng shì yī gè lì shǐ yōu jiǔ de chéng shì) - Beijing is a city with a long history.
手机没电了，我得给它充电。(shǒu jī méi diàn le, wǒ děi gěi tā chōng diàn) - My phone is out of battery, I need to charge it.
你要充分准备考试。(nǐ yào chōng fèn zhǔn bèi kǎo shì) - You should prepare thoroughly for the exam.

stage16.definition: Full of, brimming with, filled with
stage16.example: 整个房间充满了欢声笑语。(zhěng gè fáng jiān chōng mǎn le huān shēng xiào yǔ) - The whole room was filled with laughter and cheerful voices.
你们的话存在着明显的冲突。(nǐ men de huà cún zài zhe míng xiǎn de chōng tū) - There's an obvious conflict in what you're saying.

stage17.definition: To worry, to be anxious, anxiety, sorrow
stage17.example: 她整天愁眉不展。(tā zhěng tiān chóu méi bù zhǎn) - She frowns with worry all day long.
他每天抽烟很多。(tā měi tiān chōu yān hěn duō) - He smokes a lot every day.
这是厨房的刀。(zhè shì chú fáng de dāo) - This is a kitchen knife.

stage17.definition: To go on a business trip, official journey
stage17.example: 他经常出差到欧洲各国。(tā jīng cháng chū chāi dào ōu zhōu gè guó) - He often goes on business trips to various European countries.

stage17.definition: To set off, to start out, to depart
stage17.example: 我们早上六点出发。(wǒ men zǎo shang liù diǎn chū fā) - We set off at 6 AM.

stage18.example: 这本书是去年出版的。(zhè běn shū shì qù nián chū bǎn de) - This book was published last year.
紧急出口在哪里？(jǐn jí chū kǒu zài nǎ lǐ) - Where is the emergency exit?

stage18.definition: To be born of, to come from, family background
stage18.example: 他出身于一个工人家庭。(tā chū shēn yú yī gè gōng rén jiā tíng) - He comes from a working-class family.
除夕夜，全家人一起吃团圆饭。(chú xī yè, quán jiā rén yī qǐ chī tuán yuán fàn) - On New Year's Eve, the whole family eats a reunion dinner together.

stage18.definition: To appear, to emerge, to arise, to occur
stage18.example: 问题出现了，我们必须解决它。(wèn tí chū xiàn le, wǒ men bì xū jiě jué tā) - A problem has appeared, we must solve it.

stage19.definition: To create, to produce, to write, creative work
stage19.example: 他在创作一部新小说。(tā zài chuàng zuò yī bù xīn xiǎo shuō) - He is creating a new novel.
他是当地最大的窗商。(tā shì dāng dì zuì dà de chuāng shāng) - He is the largest window merchant in the area.

stage19.definition: To cede, to transfer, to yield
stage19.example: 他们被迫出让权益。(tā men bèi pò chū ràng quán yì) - They were forced to cede their rights and interests.

stage19.definition: To stimulate, to excite, to irritate
stage19.example: 这部电影刺激了他的灵感。(zhè bù diàn yǐng cì jī le tā de líng gǎn) - This movie stimulated his inspiration.
他匆匆地离开了。(tā cōng cōng de lí kāi le) - He left in a hurry.

stage20.example: 我很匆忙，没时间谈话。(wǒ hěn cōng máng, méi shí jiān tán huà) - I'm in a hurry and don't have time to talk.

stage20.definition: Previously, formerly, once upon a time
stage20.example: 从前，有一个小女孩。(cóng qián, yǒu yī gè xiǎo nǚ hái) - Once upon a time, there was a little girl.

stage20.definition: To engage in, to undertake, to deal with
stage20.example: 她从事教育工作。(tā cóng shì jiào yù gōng zuò) - She is engaged in educational work.
这本书里有许多错误。(zhè běn shū lǐ yǒu xǔ duō cuò wù) - There are many errors in this book.

stage20.definition: To transmit, to transfer, to send, transmission
stage20.example: 数据正在传输。(shù jù zhèng zài chuán shū) - The data is being transmitted.

stage21.example: 这是我们国家的传统节日。(zhè shì wǒ men guó jiā de chuán tǒng jié rì) - This is our country's traditional festival.
根据传说，龙是瑞祥的象征。(gēn jù chuán shuō, lóng shì ruì xiáng de xiàng zhēng) - According to legend, dragons are symbols of auspiciousness.

stage21.definition: To handle, to deal with, to process
stage21.example: 我知道如何处理这种情况。(wǒ zhī dào rú hé chǔ lǐ zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng) - I know how to handle this kind of situation.

stage21.definition: To save, to deposit money, savings
stage21.example: 他在银行储蓄了一笔钱。(tā zài yín háng chǔ xù le yī bǐ qián) - He has saved some money in the bank.
我常常在这家餐厅吃饭。(wǒ cháng cháng zài zhè jiā cān tīng chī fàn) - I often eat at this restaurant.
